# Sorry Project

A romantic apology web page with animated hearts, an evasive "No" button, and a heartfelt apology message.

## Project Structure
- `src/index.html` — Main HTML page
- `src/style.css` — Styles
- `src/main.js` — Heart animations, evasive No button, apology page logic

## How to Run
1. Open a terminal in the `src` folder
2. Run: `python3 -m http.server 8080`
3. Open http://localhost:8080 in your browser
